# idsec_cmgr_network (Data Source)

Cmgr Network data source, reads network information and metadata, based on the id of the network.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "idsec_cmgr_network" "example_network" {
  network_id = var.network_id
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `network_id` (String) ID of the network to get

### Optional

- `assigned_pools` (Attributes List) Assigned pools on this network (see [below for nested schema](#nestedatt--assigned_pools))
- `created_at` (String) The creation time of the network
- `name` (String) Name of the network
- `updated_at` (String) The last update time of the network

<a id="nestedatt--assigned_pools"></a>
### Nested Schema for `assigned_pools`

Optional:

- `name` (String) Name of the pool
- `pool_id` (String) ID of the pool
